text:
The Nifty Futures on the Singapore Exchange, an early indicator of Nifty performance in India, is little changed at 8585.Here are all the stocks to watch for today
HPCL: To issue free shares at 2:1 ratio.Dabur: Enters fizzy drinks market with Real VOLOVRL Logistics: Promoters drop plans of aviation foray citing incompatibility with new aviation policyIIFL Holdings: Raises Rs 1,000 crore from U.K. government fund CDC GroupBHEL: Commissions 40 MW hydro power plant in West BengalSteel Companies: Government mulls anti-dumping duty to protect domestic industry from cheap Chinese importDomestic generic drug market to USD 28 billion from the current USD 13 billion by 2020: AssochamAlok Industries: Says no communication from lenders on NPA Central Bank of India: Will consider raising up to Rs 1,300 crore on July 25 via shares to Government of India Dewan Housing: Seeks to raise up to Rs 6,500 crore via various NCDs NHPC: To consider raising up to Rs 4,500 crore via corporate bonds on July 22 SVP Global Ventures: Will invest Rs 1,000 crore rupees for expansion in Rajasthan Wipro: Gets 7-year contract from Greater Toronto Airports Authority in Canada
title: Stocks to Watch: Dabur, HDFC Bank, JSPL and More
